title: Bungee Jumping
short_description: Plunge from a tall structure with an elastic cord for a pure gravity thrill.
long_description:
Bungee Jumping is the ultimate test of courage. It involves jumping from a tall structure (cliff, bridge, or crane) while connected to a large elastic cord. The free-fall creates a massive adrenaline spike, followed by the rebound where you are pulled back up, oscillating until all kinetic energy dissipates.

Rishikesh is home to India's highest fixed-platform bungee jump (83 meters), operated by Jumpin Heights. The facility is set amidst the stunning view of the Hall river valley and follows New Zealand safety standards. Goa also has a notable jump spot at Mayem Lake (55 meters). Safety is paramount in Bungee; reputable operators use redundant systems and highly trained jump masters to ensure a zero-accident record.

locations.summary: India's highest bungee (83m) over a rocky river valley. Operated by Jumpin Heights.
55-meter jump over a scenic lake, operated by Jumpin Heights.
45-meter jump using a crane/tower setup in an adventure park.
Crane-based mobile bungee jumping (check operational status).

entry_fees.notes: Non-refundable entry fee to the premises.

pricing_metadata.disclaimer: Video recording is always charged extra (approx ₹900).

safety_guidelines: Age: Minimum 12 years. Weight: Min 40kg, Max 110kg.
Medical Conditions: No heart conditions, high BP, recent surgery, or spondylitis.
No alcohol consumption allowed before jumping.
Listen to the Jump Master. If you hesitate too long (3 calls), you may be disqualified.
equipment_checklist: Comfortable pants/shorts (harness goes around waist and ankles)
major_experiences: Standing on the edge of the cantilever platform
Retrieval process where you are lowered to the river (Rishikesh)

sample_itinerary.one_day: 9:00 AM: Drive to Mohan Chatti (1 hr from Tapovan). 10:00 AM: Check-in, weigh-in, medical form. 10:30 AM: Briefing & Harnessing. 11:00 AM: The Jump. 11:30 AM: Trek up from river (15 mins). 12:00 PM: Watch your video & collect certificate.

booking_details.suggested_stay: Rishikesh: Aloha on the Ganges or Hosteller for budget.
booking_details.how_to_reach: Mohan Chatti is 25km uphill from Rishikesh city. Taxis are available.

seo.seo_title: Bungee Jumping in India: Rishikesh (Highest), Goa, Lonavala | 2024
seo.seo_description: Dare to jump from India's highest bungee platform (83m) in Rishikesh. Check prices (₹3700), weight limits, and booking info for Jumpin Heights.

highlights: Rishikesh jump is 83 meters high - roughly same as a 20-story building.
Operated by ex-Army officers and New Zealand trained staff.
Goa location offers a unique jump over a lake.
You receive a 'Dare to Jump' certificate.
One of the safest adventure setups in India.
Combo packages with Giant Swing available.
